newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Salomon '96 EPS view cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Salomon '96 EPS view cut.

text.p: -- Brown Brothers Harriman analyst Raphael Soifer said he cut his 1996 earnings estimate on Salomon Inc to $6.60 per share from $6.80.
-- The move followed the release of Salomon's third-quarter earnings, which fell $0.40 short Brown Brothers' forecast. The result "were bad, but not a disaster," Soifer said.
--The analyst raised his fourth-quarter estimate to $1.20 from $1.00, citing improving market conditions.

-- He left unchanged his 1997 estimate of $4.75 per share but noted "Salomon's quarterly earnings will continue to fluctuate wildly...and no quarterly EPS estimate is ever likely to enjoy a high confidence level."
-- Soifer made no change to his market perform/hold rating on the shares.
-- On the New York Stock Exchange, the stock was trading at 45, down 3-5/8, at 1340 EDT/1740 GMT Tuesday.
